text: 2.15 2 Ko 5.17, Gal 6.15, Epe 4.24, Kol 1.20-22, 2.14, 2.20 Ne kumak tek, takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak mɨdupsek dɨyokak. Takaw kɨles tɨkɨlak ak sek takaw binɨb gɨnɨgel ma gɨnɨgel tɨkɨlak ak sek, mɨdupsek dɨyokak. Juda binɨb jɨj ak ke, binɨb Juda mel jɨj ak ke ma yenɨgel, omɨŋal gɨl dɨ jɨmñɨl len jɨj nokom olap yenɨgel agɨl, gos anɨb ak nɨŋɨd anɨgak. Pen anɨgek, chɨn jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl mɨdtep gɨpun.
